step2.today_weight_is_null: Today's weight is not settled. Complete it and come back to trainer.
step2.check_results: If these informations are not correct. Change them in weight and diary, then come back to trainer.

step10.level_of_activity_warning: You can also, choose lower activity and add burnt calories directly in nutrition diary

step20.title: New goal
step20.new_calories: Your caloric demand was changed and is equal to:
step20.rule_1: After saving, notice food and weight.
step20.rule_2_step_1: After a week, come back to trainer
step20.warning: Your caloric demand is lower than 1200kcal.It is not desirable. Try to eat at least 1200kcal and make deficit with extra activity.

countFromZeroCheck.title: Check
countFromZeroCheck.information: Check if the values are proper. They will be used to calculate your diet. You can change them in settings

countFromZeroCounting.title: Creating goal
countFromZeroCounting.level_of_activity_warning: You can also, choose lower activity and add burnt calories directly in nutrition diary
countFromZeroCounting.do_you_workout_on_gym: Do you workout at the gym? (more proteins)
countFromZeroCounting.goal_information: Slower progress is usually better. Coach analyzes progress and might double goal for a week, before learning your body's reaction.

countFromZeroResult.your_daily_macronutrients: Your daily macronutrients look like this
countFromZeroResult.rules_1: Body needs calories (energy) to survive. If you eat more calories than body needs, it starts to be held as fat. If you eat less, your body start to burn fat to balance the deficit. Every product you eat has calories, which we categorise as macronutrients - proteins, carbs and fats. Your body need specific number of all of them to properly function. As long as calories are right, you will achive your dreamt result.
countFromZeroResult.rules_2: Weigh and count in application every product you eat (even oil to cook). If you want to cook it, count before cooking. Every product has macronutrition on back of package, but most of it, we already have in app.
countFromZeroResult.rules_3: Choose product this way, to be as close with macronutrients as you can. Calories (kcal) has to be almost perfect, because they determine success. Remember, you can use junk food, but healthy foods have less calories and more volume, which lets you eat more.
countFromZeroResult.rules_4: The numbers of meals per day does NOT matter when calories are right. You can eat as many meals as you prefer. Spliting meals for around 40g proteins per one meal might increase muscle growth.
countFromZeroResult.rules_5: Everyday count weight in application. Weight has to be counted on empty stama and after toilet. Don't worry about your results, daily weight might change even with 2kg.
countFromZeroResult.rules_6: If you will have extra activity, which you didn't count previously, you have to add it as burnt calories. You can also do extra activity to have more calories for food. As long as you count everything in the app.
countFromZeroResult.rules_7: You got to know the secret of a diet that works, which doesn't make you give up on your favorite products. Key in all necessary data and analyze it every 7 (first time 14) days. The application will do the rest.

analyzeAnyChanges.title: Any changes you would like to make?
analyzeAnyChanges.information: You don't have to change anything.

warningMessage.information: You have less than 1300kcal. If you know what you are doing or you are counting burnt calories directly in diary, you can skip the information.
warningMessage.how_to_apply: To apply one of those options, you have to use again coach, but this time with different options on diet page.
warningMessage.new_warning_1: We recommend having at least 1300kcal per day to create enough volume from food, so you should
warningMessage.new_warning_3: kcal per day from extra activity
warningMessage.new_warning_4: (without activity counted in activity level). For example, walking for 1 hour might burn around 450kcal. You don't have to do this, but if you decide on extra activity, remember about adding it in the application.

macroSliders.would_u_grams_per_100kg: Would you like to add protein as grams per 100kg of weight?
macroSliders.handle_macro: We will handle % of total calories for macronutrient with the lowest value. Next we will settle protein. Rest of the calories will go to last macronutrient.

notTimeForAnalyze.description: It's not yet time for weigh in. We recommend you to wait until counting will end. Your body needs time to adapt and coach needs right data to make good analyze.

analyzeSomethingWentWrong.title: Decision
analyzeSomethingWentWrong.part_1: Your numbers shows you did good job, but we didn't see expected progress.
analyzeSomethingWentWrong.part_3: Inaccurate counting calories - the most common problem.
analyzeSomethingWentWrong.part_4: Hard training - your body burnt fat and built muscles.
analyzeSomethingWentWrong.part_5: Supplements (possible creatine) or food, which caused water retention.
analyzeSomethingWentWrong.part_6: We have 3 options to handle it
analyzeSomethingWentWrong.part_7: let coach count as nothing happened. It might make your calories very low, then later it will comeback on right level.
analyzeSomethingWentWrong.part_8: You will continue next week with the same amount of calories.
analyzeSomethingWentWrong.part_9: For one week you will be back on weight maintanence calories. Your goal will be continued after this period.
analyzeSomethingWentWrong.part_10: Every option will bring you to same place. You only choose the level of difficulty.

endDietCheck.description: You should consider the ending of your diet, if you started to notice one of these things
endDietCheck.option_3: You are eating too low amount of calories for your comfort zone

endDietOptions.standard: Immediately return back to calories, which maintain your weight and aim to save actual results.
endDietOptions.reverse_diet: Immediately return back on calories, which maintain your weight, then slowly increase them, minimizing fat gain (metabolism boost).
